inclusion.criterion: diagnose asthma by specialist of asthma (based on symptoms)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: history of recurrent coughing, wheezing, or shortness of breath at rest or with exercise, symptomatic

exclusion.criterion: the child had been hospitalized for any severe respiratory condition
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: a physician had ever stated that the child had asthma, reactive airway diseases, or the child had taken antiasthma medications for symptoms
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: the child was diagnosed with congenital heart disease requiring surgery or medications for management
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: there are positive responses concerning other serious chest problems, chest surgery, chronic productive cough, recurrent intractable wheezing, and shortness of breath
exclusion.label: unknown
